ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] That wurm guy in BW...
ygData.msgSnippet: well only been 57 for 5 months now =)  i finally decided i wanted 58, get riposte and its a big hp boost level.   and i SWEAR this is my last level Elwyn.
ygData.messageBody:
well only been 57 for 5 months now =) i finally decided i wanted 58, get
riposte and its a big hp boost level. and i SWEAR this is my last level
Elwyn. although it is very nice to be able to experience with just you and
your cleric wife, it's amazing what a donal's BP can do.

Shada, 57.95 bard


> Hahaha shada.. sounds like you're stuck in the same xp hole I am in
> *giggles*
> Not sure though, but it seemed like i got a LOT of xp killing
> just a few
> things in Velious yesterday.. hmmmm
